wikipedia_page.main: Patricia Grace Wilson (17 December 1929 – 2005) was a British author of 53 romance novels for the Mills & Boon publisher from 1986 to 2004. She placed her novels primarily in England, Spain or France.Wilson died in Yorkshire in 2010.
